SEARCH

Uses of Package
com.github.hanyaeger.core.annotations

Packages that use com.github.hanyaeger.core.annotations
Package
Description
com.github.hanyaeger.api
Classes and packages that are part of the public API of Yaeger.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
All classes, interfaces and enumerations that are related to entities and their behaviour.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes
All classes, interfaces and enumerations that are related to scenes.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput
All interfaces that enable an instance of YaegerEntity, YaegerScene or both to receive user input.
com.github.hanyaeger.core
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.motion
 
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core.annotations used by com.github.hanyaeger.api
    Class
    Description
    OnActivation
    A method annotated with OnActivation will be automatically called by the AnnotationProcessor during activation of either an YaegerEntity or a YaegerScene.
    OnPostActivation
    A method annotated with OnActivation will be automatically called by the AnnotationProcessor after activation of either an YaegerEntity or a YaegerScene.
    UpdatableProvider
    A method annotated with UpdatableProvider should return an Updatable and will automatically be called during activation of an YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to gathers all objects that contain an Updatable.update(long) method that should be called at each Game world update.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core.annotations used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
    Class
    Description
    UpdatableProvider
    A method annotated with UpdatableProvider should return an Updatable and will automatically be called during activation of an YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to gathers all objects that contain an Updatable.update(long) method that should be called at each Game world update.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core.annotations used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes
    Class
    Description
    OnActivation
    A method annotated with OnActivation will be automatically called by the AnnotationProcessor during activation of either an YaegerEntity or a YaegerScene.
    UpdatableProvider
    A method annotated with UpdatableProvider should return an Updatable and will automatically be called during activation of an YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to gathers all objects that contain an Updatable.update(long) method that should be called at each Game world update.
